SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.network.server.rmi

Interface ActionsRMI

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
Connection
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionRMI, ConnectionTCP, VirtualView
public interface ActionsRMI extends Remote
Interface of all Actions that the client can do in the server after connection This is the interface exposed in the network Implemented by VirtualView
